functionality.name: Password Management
functionality.description: A feature that allows users to change or reset their passwords, with feedback for actions and errors.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to change their current password.
The system must validate that the new password meets security requirements.
The system must provide feedback to the user when the password is successfully changed.
The system must offer a 'Forgot Password' functionality to reset the password via a secure process.
The system must provide feedback for errors during password reset, such as mismatched entries or invalid tokens.

epics.description: Allow users to change their password.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to change my password to keep my account safe.

tasks.description: Design a UI for the password change form.
Implement backend validation to check security requirements.
Add error handling for mismatched new and confirmation passwords.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want feedback confirming that my password has been updated.

tasks.description: Integrate backend functionality to update the userâ€™s password and display feedback.

epics.description: Enable users to reset their password in case they forget it.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it.

tasks.description: Create a 'Forgot Password' UI with fields for entering and confirming a new password.
Implement token-based authentication for secure password resets.
Add backend logic to validate reset tokens and update passwords.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive an error message if the new password doesn't match the confirmation field during a reset.

tasks.description: Implement error messages for invalid reset attempts or mismatched passwords.

epics.description: Provide feedback during password management actions.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see feedback during password-related actions to know what to do next.

tasks.description: Design error and success dialogs for password management actions.
Add logic to display success or error messages based on the backend response.
